languages.text: "{mf|Мужчину|Женщину}, что встал{mf||а} со мной плечом к плечу и помог{mf||ла} истребить культистов на Футфоле", {n}— Арджента улыбается, будто вспоминает не кровавый бой, а праздник, проведенный в компании друзей.{/n}

"A {mf|man|woman} who stood shoulder to shoulder with me and helped eradicate the cultists on Footfall." {n}Argenta smiles, as if reminiscing about a pleasant evening spent in the company of friends rather than a bloody battle.{/n}
languages.original_text: "{mf|Мужчину|Женщину}, что встал{mf||а} со мной плечом к плечу и помог{mf||ла} истребить культистов на Футфоле", {n}— Арджента улыбается, будто вспоминает не кровавый бой, а праздник, проведенный в компании друзей.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "A {mf|man|woman} who stood shoulder to shoulder with me and helped eradicate the cultists on Footfall." {n}Argenta smiles, as if reminiscing not about a bloody battle, but rather a pleasant evening spent in the company of friends.{/n}
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "A {mf|man|woman} who stood shoulder to shoulder with me and helped eradicate the cultists on Footfall." {n}Argenta smiles, as if reminiscing not about a bloody battle, but rather a pleasant evening spent in the company of friends.{/n}
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "A {mf|man|woman} who stood shoulder to shoulder with me and helped eradicate the cultists on Footfall." {n}Argenta smiles, as if reminiscing about a pleasant evening spent in the company of friends rather than a bloody battle.{/n}
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "A {mf|man|woman} who stood shoulder to shoulder with me and helped eradicate the cultists on Footfall." {n}Argenta smiles, as if reminiscing about a pleasant evening spent in the company of friends rather than a bloody battle.{/n}
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "A {mf|man|woman} who stood shoulder to shoulder with me and helped eradicate the cultists on Footfall." {n}Argenta smiles, as if reminiscing about a pleasant evening spent in the company of friends rather than a bloody battle.{/n}
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: “一位与我并肩作战的{mf|兄弟|姐妹}，帮助我铲除掉了落脚港的邪教徒。” {n}阿洁塔微笑着，仿佛在回忆与朋友一起度过的愉快夜晚，而非一场血腥的战斗。{/n}
languages.original_text: "A {mf|man|woman} who stood shoulder to shoulder with me and helped eradicate the cultists on Footfall." {n}Argenta smiles, as if reminiscing about a pleasant evening spent in the company of friends rather than a bloody battle.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “一位与我并肩作战的{mf|兄弟|姐妹}，帮助我铲除掉了落脚港的邪教徒。” {n}阿洁塔微笑着，仿佛在回忆与朋友一起度过的愉快夜晚，而非一场血腥的战斗。{/n}
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: «Es un{mf| hombre |a mujer} que luchó codo con codo a mi lado y me ayudó a erradicar al culto en Paso». {n}Argenta sonríe como si recordara una placentera velada en compañía de amigos y no una sangrienta batalla.{/n}
languages.original_text: "A {mf|man|woman} who stood shoulder to shoulder with me and helped eradicate the cultists on Footfall." {n}Argenta smiles, as if reminiscing about a pleasant evening spent in the company of friends rather than a bloody battle.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Es un{mf| hombre |a mujer} que luchó codo con codo a mi lado y me ayudó a erradicar al culto en Paso». {n}Argenta sonríe como si recordara una placentera velada en compañía de amigos y no una sangrienta batalla.{/n}
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: 「我と肩を並べ、フットフォールの教団を撲滅する手助けをしてくれた人だ」{n}アルジェンタは、血なまぐさい戦いよりも、友人たちと過ごした楽しい夜を思い出すかのように微笑む。{/n}
languages.original_text: "A {mf|man|woman} who stood shoulder to shoulder with me and helped eradicate the cultists on Footfall." {n}Argenta smiles, as if reminiscing about a pleasant evening spent in the company of friends rather than a bloody battle.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「我と肩を並べ、フットフォールの教団を撲滅する手助けをしてくれた人だ」{n}アルジェンタは、血なまぐさい戦いよりも、友人たちと過ごした楽しい夜を思い出すかのように微笑む。{/n}
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "{mf|Einen Mann, der|Eine Frau, die} an meiner Seite stand und mir geholfen hat, die Kultisten auf Footfall auszulöschen." {n}Argenta lächelt, als würde sie sich an einen angenehmen Abend mit Freunden erinnern und nicht an einen blutigen Kampf.{/n}
languages.original_text: "A {mf|man|woman} who stood shoulder to shoulder with me and helped eradicate the cultists on Footfall." {n}Argenta smiles, as if reminiscing about a pleasant evening spent in the company of friends rather than a bloody battle.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "{mf|Einen Mann, der|Eine Frau, die} an meiner Seite stand und mir geholfen hat, die Kultisten auf Footfall auszulöschen." {n}Argenta lächelt, als würde sie sich an einen angenehmen Abend mit Freunden erinnern und nicht an einen blutigen Kampf.{/n}
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: « {mf|Un homme|Une femme} qui a combattu à mes côtés et m'a aidée à éradiquer les cultistes de Castel. » {n}Argenta sourit, comme si elle se remémorait une soirée agréable passée en compagnie d'amis plutôt qu'une bataille sanglante.{/n}
languages.original_text: "A {mf|man|woman} who stood shoulder to shoulder with me and helped eradicate the cultists on Footfall." {n}Argenta smiles, as if reminiscing about a pleasant evening spent in the company of friends rather than a bloody battle.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « {mf|Un homme|Une femme} qui a combattu à mes côtés et m'a aidée à éradiquer les cultistes de Castel. » {n}Argenta sourit, comme si elle se remémorait une soirée agréable passée en compagnie d'amis plutôt qu'une bataille sanglante.{/n}
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Benimle sırt sırta verip Binliman'daki tarikatçıların kökünü kurutan bir {mf|adam|kadın}." {n}Argenta gülümsüyor. Gülümsemesi, kanlı bir savaşın anılarından ziyade arkadaşlarıyla geçirdiği keyifli bir günü hatırladığı izlenimi yaratıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "A {mf|man|woman} who stood shoulder to shoulder with me and helped eradicate the cultists on Footfall." {n}Argenta smiles, as if reminiscing about a pleasant evening spent in the company of friends rather than a bloody battle.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Benimle sırt sırta verip Binliman'daki tarikatçıların kökünü kurutan bir {mf|adam|kadın}." {n}Argenta gülümsüyor. Gülümsemesi, kanlı bir savaşın anılarından ziyade arkadaşlarıyla geçirdiği keyifli bir günü hatırladığı izlenimi yaratıyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion
